DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read applications and service principals on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.consentDescription: Allows the app to read applications and service principals on your behalf.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Manage app permission grants and app role assignments
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to manage permission grants for application permissions to any API (including Microsoft Graph) and application assignments for any app, on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.consentDisplayName: Manage app permission grants and app role assignments
DelegatedWork.consentDescription: Allows the app to manage permission grants for application permissions to any API (including Microsoft Graph) and application assignments for any app, on your behalf.

DelegatedPersonal.adminDescription: Allows the app to read applications and service principals on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedPersonal.consentDescription: Allows the app to read applications and service principals on your behalf.

Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read all applications and service principals without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Manage apps that this app creates or owns
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to create other applications, and fully manage those applications (read, update, update application secrets and delete), without a signed-in user.  It cannot update any apps that it is not an owner of.

Application.adminDisplayName: Manage app permission grants and app role assignments
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to manage permission grants for application permissions to any API (including Microsoft Graph) and application assignments for any app, without a signed-in user.
